violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription:
(A) The FOOD-CONTACT SURFACES of cooking and baking EQUIPMENT shall be cleaned at least every 24 hours. This section does not apply to hot oil cooking and filtering EQUIPMENT if it is cleaned as specified in Subparagraph 4-602.11(D)(6).   
(B) The cavities and door seals of microwave ovens shall be cleaned at least every 24 hours by using the manufacturer's recommended cleaning procedure.
violationsByInspectionidList.itemDescription: Microwave oven door seals and cavities

violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: A toilet room used by females shall be provided with a covered receptacle for sanitary napkins.
NonFOOD-CONTACT SURFACES of EQUIPMENT shall be cleaned at a frequency necessary to preclude accumulation of soil residues.

Sec. 2129. (1) All food establishments shall employ a minimum of 1 managerial employee as a food safety manager, who must be an individual who is currently certified under a personnel certification program accredited by the American National Standards Institute, utilizing the Conference for Food Protection standards:
(2) Beginning January 14, 2017 and every 5 years thereafter, a certified  food safety manager who supervises the operations of a food service establishment shall have completed a food safety training program
containing an allergen awareness  component that has been approved by  the department. A food service establishment shall retain records on the  site of the food service establishment documenting compliance of its  certified food safety managers with this subsection.
NonFOOD-CONTACT SURFACES of EQUIPMENT shall be cleaned at a frequency necessary to preclude accumulation of soil residues.

(A) PHYSICAL FACILITIES shall be cleaned as often as necessary to keep them clean.
(B) Except spill cleanup, cleaning shall be done during periods when the least amount of FOOD is exposed such as after closing.
Cleaned EQUIPMENT and UTENSILS, laundered LINENS, and SINGLE-SERVICE and SINGLE-USE ARTICLES shall be stored in an approved manner and location.
violationsByInspectionidList.problemDescription: Stored on floor or less than 6 inches above floor
violationsByInspectionidList.subLocation: On the floor Single service items
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Store at least 6 inches above the floor.

violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: Except otherwise approved, and except for antislip floor coverings or applications may be used for safety reasons, floors, floor coverings, walls, wall coverings, and ceilings shall be designed, constructed, and installed so they are SMOOTH and EASILY CLEANABLE.
violationsByInspectionidList.problemDescription: Not constructed, designed, installed to be
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Repair/replace to be smooth and easily cleanable.

violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription:
(A) FOOD TEMPERATURE MEASURING DEVICES shall be provided and readily accessible for use in ensuring attainment and maintenance of FOOD temperatures as specified under Chapter 3. (Pf)   
(B) A TEMPERATURE MEASURING DEVICE with a suitable small-diameter probe that is designed to measure the temperature of thin masses shall be provided and readily accessible to accurately measure the temperature in thin FOODS such as MEAT patties and FISH filets. (Pf)
A test kit or other device that accurately measures the concentration in mg/L of SANITIZING solutions shall be provided. (Pf)
The PREMISES shall be free of items that are unnecessary to the operation or maintenance of the establishment such as EQUIPMENT that is nonfunctional, no longer used and free of litter.
violationsByInspectionidList.subItem: items that don't pertain to business

violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: The PREMISES shall be free of items that are unnecessary to the operation or maintenance of the establishment such as EQUIPMENT that is nonfunctional, no longer used and free of litter.
violationsByInspectionidList.subItem: items that don't pertain to business

violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: Outer openings of a FOOD ESTABLISHMENT shall be protected against the entry of insects and rodents. Unless otherwise allowed by law.
violationsByInspectionidList.subLocation: To the left of Roll down door
